scripts.compose: npx tsx --env-file ../../cosmo/cli/.env ../../cosmo/cli/src/index.ts router compose -i graph.yaml -o config.json
scripts.build: npx tsx --env-file ../../cosmo/cli/.env ../../cosmo/cli/src/index.ts router plugin build plugins/users --debug && npm run compose
scripts.test: npx tsx --env-file ../../cosmo/cli/.env ../../cosmo/cli/src/index.ts router plugin test plugins/users
scripts.generate: npx tsx --env-file ../../cosmo/cli/.env ../../cosmo/cli/src/index.ts router plugin build plugins/users --generate-only
